site.title: AI Talent Factory

hero.headline: AI Talent Factory

programs.title: AI Engineer Bootcamp

programs.title: Full-Stack Developer (Intermediate → Advanced)
programs.desc: Frontend modern, backend scalable, CI/CD, dan deployment cloud.

programs.title: SQA Engineer
programs.desc: Quality engineering modern: automation, performance, security & observability.

benefits.title: Kurikulum Industri
benefits.desc: Materi disusun dari kebutuhan real job-market dan SKKNI.

benefits.title: Real Project & PoC
benefits.desc: Belajar sambil membangun solusi riil untuk industri/instansi.

benefits.title: Mentoring Intensif

benefits.title: Talent Pool
benefits.desc: Lulusan terbaik masuk database rekrutmen partner.

testimonials.name: Alumni Batch 1
testimonials.quote: Programnya keras tapi hasilnya nyata. Portofolio saya langsung dipakai untuk apply kerja.

testimonials.name: Alumni Batch 2
testimonials.quote: CI/CD, deployment, dan monorepo dijelaskan sampai kebayang workflow industri.

cta.headline: Siap jadi talenta AI & Full-Stack Indonesia berikutnya?
cta.sub: Daftar sekarang dan mulai bangun PoC industri bersama mentor.
